newsitem.title: USA: Personnel to place $100 mln in notes.
newsitem.headline: Personnel to place $100 mln in notes.

text.p: Personnel Group of America said on Thursday it plans to raise $100 million in a private placement of convertible subordinated notes in lieu of a previously announced placement of senior subordinated notes.
The company said that it intends to use the proceeds to repay existing debt, including some that is outstanding under its bank credit facilities.
Some of the funds used to repay some of the debt may be reborrowed to fund acquisitions, and for other corporate purposes, the company said.
Personnel Group provides information technology staffing and consulting services, among other staffing services.
